text: pus agar Allah tala aap ko in ki kisi jamath ki taraf lauta kar wapas le aae phir ye aap se maidan e jung mein nikalne ki ijazath talab kare tuh aap keh dijiye ke tum mere sath hargiz chal nahi sakte aur na mere sath tum dushmano se ladai kar sakte ho,tum ne pehli martaba hee bait rehne ko pasand kiya tha,pus tum piche reh jane walo mein hee baite raho
